actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Rules.
Reported to House from the Committee on Rules with amendment, H. Rept. 94-766.
Measure called up by unanimous consent in House.
Measure passed House, amended, roll call #71 (258-107).

official_title: A resolution to amend the Rules of the House of Representatives to provide that the House may not consider any report of a committee, bill, resolution, or a report of a committee of conference unless copies or reproductions have been available to Members on the floor at least two hours before such consideration.

summary.text: (Reported to House from the Committee on Rules with amendment, H. Rept. 94-766) Revises Rules XI and XXVIII of the Rules of the House of Representatives to prohibit the consideration of any measure reported by committee, except the Committee on Rules, unless copies of such report and the reported measure or matter have been available to the Members at least two hours before the beginning of such consideration. Authorizes conference reports to be called up for consideration, notwithstanding this restriction.

titles.title: A resolution to amend the Rules of the House of Representatives to provide that the House may not consider any report of a committee, bill, resolution, or a report of a committee of conference unless copies or reproductions have been available to Members on the floor at least two hours before such consideration.
